It has been very difficult in almost every period of history to exhibit a noble posture, to acquire truthfulness and to maintain it in heart.
I wish for long and fruitful battles at @MJSbelgique, which is celebrating its 50th birthday today
The upright posture requires patience, it requires perseverance, it requires endurance, but we know something: Sabreden has reached the goal.
After every difficulty, there is a certain convenience, we believe in difficulties, we overcome and we are moving towards our goal with determined steps.
The grandchildren of a noble nation can not be trapped in the narrow horizons of a noble nation.
We have to fight for the oppressed on earth, for victims to be able to get away from every place they fall, to embrace justice.
We never have to get rehab. When we are rehabilitated, the fire that is in us is the fire of truth in our hearts, that is, the noble posture is lost.
